text:
Tensyr | Autonomous vehicle, cloud, UI/UX and data engineers | Mountain View, CA | ONSITE

Tensyr is building the production car and cloud software stack for autonomous vehicles. Our dataflow graph stack enables smarter, more efficient on-vehicle software using the latest compute/vision/inference accelerators. Our dataflow cloud stack lets you rapidly build more and better models, do massively parallel simulation, and then deploy to the car. We call this dataOS, and we're hiring engineers at all layers of the stack.

Check out our careers here: http://www.tensyr.com/careers.html

Or drop me a note directly: niall@tensyr.com
